system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.ASTJrSsAlGdEGNe4]{Point Blank Shot}

Benefits

The character can shoot or throw ranged weapons at an opponent engaged in melee without penalty.

Normal

A character takes a -4 penalty when using a ranged weapon to attack an opponent who is engaged in melee combat.
